values:
Okay well this weekend was pretty fun. Friday night I did absolutely nothing so that was extremely boring!

Saturday I woke up around 7:30 to go to an optional swim practice that was from 8-10. But it really wasn't optional for me, becuase my mother made me go. grrr. OH well. After I got home I inhaled some mcd's mcgriddle.. YUM. Then I went upstairs and got some clothes on so I could help my dad out in the yard. All I did was pretty much help pick up sticks. Which is not fun at all! But then my dad got bit by some weird looking bug that was prolly poisonus so he sent me inside. After a while he comes back in and says I need some more help. So I put my shoes back on and went outside to help. I swear I got bit by mosquitoes like 20 times! My legs were itching like crazy. Then I walked my dog stepped in an ant pile and started freaking out cuz they were biting me! So I came inside and took like a 3 hour nap. I enjoyed that very much. Then around 5 I took a shower and got ready for Frankies and then Ginny's for the night. Frankies was lots of fun. First it was just me, ryan, ginny, and tristan. But after one ride on the go carts Chris and Josh were there. So we rode around the go carts one more time. Then went inside and just sat and chilled. Then Sanchez showed up, which is really cool, and then Sean, even better. There were like 6 guys and 2 girls.. OH YEAH! lol. The guys ((no Ryan tho)) took Ginny's phone and took it apart... then split up in the game room and went crazy. Me and Ginny stole Ryan's truck but I felt bad so I didn't go that far. Then the game w/ ginny's phone got old so she got it back. Then everyone was bored and quiet. So me, Ginny, and Ryan go to Ginny's house and chilled there for a while. Ryan left around 10:30 and me and Ginny stayed up until like 2 or something.

Today was pretty good too! I woke up around 10 to see Ginny already wide awake and talking online. So she tells me to get on in the guest room. I stayed at her house until around 1:30 or something.. got home and had to run to the Atkinson's to feed there fish and cat. I came home and Ryan came over! YAY! Today is 1 month from when we first started going out.. so awsm I love you Ryan!! =D But yeah. He stayed over until like 4:45 and had to go home =( and now I'm here at the computer extremely bored! and I don't feel too great =( OH well!

Weekend was alright.. Sat. night and those few hours I was w/ Ryan were awsm! but yeah. Later Tards!

<3 Caro <3

Well I think today.. and mainly tonight was pretty good. School was alright, but I mean it's school.. it's quite rare for it to be GREAT *lol* but yeah tonight was a little better. I went to swim practice.. actually swam everything.. got harrased.. of course.. and then I came home.. I didn't feel liek doing hw but I did anywayz. I figured that my hw was gonna take me forever! but finished all of it by 10. I had like a 20-30 min break for pizza and all that good stuff =)

I'm jealous.. Tristan got to go to the Slipknot Concert and I did't! He should have gotten me something! *lol* j/k Tristan! Your awsm.. hopefully Shinedown will be good.. cuz I'm going!! *lol* But yeah.. I so would have talked my parents into letting me go but I had a swim meet. Meet went alright.. word of advice DONT EVER DRINK REDBULL BEFORE YOU SWIM! ugg everyone that had some of my mixture of gatorade and redbull didn't feel all that great that night.. SORRY! but yeah. The boys won 94 to something.. and the girls tied.. 85 to 85 so it's all good! =P

Well I'm goin.. later tards!

<3 Caro <3

Ahh the joys of not having school b/c the school had no power was quite nice! I spent half of my day w/ the wonderful Ryan and Ginny.. that was fun! We watched "The Girl Next Door" that movie is pretty good!  The rest of the day was okay.. I worked a little on my project and took a nap. Then I went to swim practice and ummm found out some interesting information from Aaron about Richard. But yeah.. then after swim practice I ate dinner and started working on my project.. talked on the phone w/ Sanchez for a while and finished my project. But during that stage I started thinking about things that I'm not going to say cuz I don't want to world to know but I just wish I could be selfish!!! and get two of what I know I can't have =( but yeah.. later tards!

<3 Caro <3

WELL I survived Tropical Storm Gaston.. so glad everyone freaked out about this one.. even tho it did more damage than Hurrican Charlie.. I think that's weird... Power was out most of the day which sucked major ass! But once the power came back on I had to type up my paper for Sociology. Mine is 817 words.. YAY.. only had to be 400 *heh* ANYWAYZ! I tried to start on the mobile part of it but didn't get that far.. I talked to Ryan then Sanchez.. and I was ADD a LOT.. I think this ADD thing is really kicking in.. maybe I should go to the doctor.. NAAAWW! I don't care!! *lol*

Nothing much more to say.. but that it sucks we have to go to school tomorrow =( oh well!

<3 Caro <3

+ Known as: Caroline
+ Age: 15
+ Lives in(on): North Chuck Town, SC
+ Birthday: January 16
+ School: fort dorchester high school
+ Religion: Catholic.. would love to change it tho
+ Shoe size: anywhere from a 6 to a 7
+ Eye Color: blye
+ Style: umm Caroline's style
+ Fears: heights, being alone, and stalkers
+ Tan or White: losing my tan =( how depressing

SECTION 2 HAVE YOU EVER... 
+ Cheated on someone? no
+ Fallen off the bed? yeah.. and I've had people PUSH me off the bed
+ Fallen for a relative? nope
+ Broke someone's heart? yes
+ Had your heart broken? no
+ Had a dream come true? YUP
+ Done something you regret? hell yeah
+ Cheated on a test? YUP

SECTION 3 CURRENTLY... 
+ Wearing? jeans and a coosaw creek swim team t-shirt
+ Listening to? YEAH TOAST
+ Located? in the kitchen
+ Chatting with? myself...
+ Watching? the computer screen
+ Should REALLY be doing? working on my sociology project

SECTION 4 DO YOU... 
+ Brush your teeth? yeah
+ Like anybody? UMM YEAH
+ Have any piercings? my ears.. I want my eyebrow or lip and bellybutton
+ Drive? I have a permit...
+ Drink? soda...
+ Smoke? hell no
+ Got a cellphone? yes
+ Got a pager? those things are old now *lol*


SECTION 7 PERSONAL... 
+ What do you want to be when you grow up? pyschologist
+ What has been the best day of your life? everyday I'm with my Ryan =)
+ What comes first in your life? friends, family, school, and swim team!
+ Do you have a boyfriend/girlfriend? yes.. the greatest one in the world
+ What do you usually think about before you go to bed? ummm lots of stuff
+ you lose someone you really loved? almost did
+how many times have you fallen deeply in love? never been "in love" but I gots the highshool love...


SECTION 8 FAVORITE... 
+ Movie: umm
+ Song: Getting away with Murder, Papa Roach
+ Group: ALL AMERICAN REJECTS and SLIPKNOT
+ Store: Hot Topic, Journeys, Charlotte Rousse, Gadzooks and PacSun
+ Relative: my family
+ Sport: SWIMMING
+ Ice Cream Flavor: cookies-n-cream

SECTION 9 DO YOU... 
+ Like to give hugs? hell yeah
+ Like to give kisses? yes
+ Like to walk in the rain? OH HELL YEAH
+ Prefer black or blue pens? black
+ Like to travel? yeah
+ Sleep on your side, stomach, or back? stomach and side
+ Think you're attractive? uh no
+ Have a fish? Well we use to have like millions of them.. but they always died... so we gave up
+ Ever have the falling dream? uck.. I hate those lol
+ Have stuffed animals? OH YEAH

SECTION 10 WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT... 
+ Abortion: it's understandable.. tho I think it's a little wrong
+ Bill Clinton: Bill Cliton
+ Smoking: stay away from me if you smoke.. I need my lungs clean!
+ Suicide: is sad
+ Summer: swim team 24/7 pretty much but it's all good! and finally WARMTH!
+ Tattoos: I'm getting a hott pink skull-n-crossbones on my back! =)
+ Piercings: awsm

SECTION 11 THIS OR THAT... 
+ Pierced nose or tongue? hmm both are cool
+ Single or taken? taken!
+ MTV or BET? FUSE
+ 7th Heaven or Dawson's Creek? 7th Heavan
+ Sugar or salt? sugar 
+ Silver or gold? silver
+ Color or Black-and-white photos? black and white
+ M&M's or Skittles? skittles
+ Stay up late or wake up early? stay up late.. very late
+ Hot or cold? hot
+ Sun or moon? both 
+ Left or Right? straight
+ 10 Acquaintances or one best friend? best friend.. tho I have like 3
+ Mustard or ketchup? ketchup
+ Spring or Fall? Summer
+ Happy or sad? happy
+ Wonder or amazement? both
+ Burger King or McDonald's? Hardees
+ Mexican or Italian food? MEXICAN tho Italian is really good
+ Lights on or off? off...
+ Pepsi or Coke? Pepsi

Last night was Fort Dorchestor's first highschool swim meet *woot woot* Both the guys and girls won the meet which is awsm and I must brag a little.. I did pretty damn good... both of the relays I was in got 1st place, I got 1st in 100 fly and 2nd in the 500 free! I was happy.. what made the night even better was RYAN was there.. HORAY!

Today was a pretty damn good day too.. except after school *lol* I had after school detention w/ Mrs. Horton.. me and Christi had to scrape gum.. SO GROSS!!! Yeah.. so um I'm having some friends over tonight to watch some movies =) hopefully that will be fun! and there really is much more to say!

<3 Caro <3

Ahh well I seem to get really bored sometimes and I like to talk.. and this time I don't think I'm gonna end it cuz I think no one reads it... cuz oh well.. I'll talk to myself and I foudn out people DO read this shit *lol*

So anywayz.. not too much has happened in school... HW has been a big ass bitch lately and tomorrow is gonna be hell! *lol* I have my first swim meet.. It's at Coosaw Creek Pool @ 6 pm $2 to get in.. *hint hint* oh fuck that COME AND SEE ME SWIM! Yeah umm I'm gonna have no time to do hw! I have like 3-4 things due in Chemistry, a Sociology test.. most likley algebra hw.. and spanish hw.. AHH too much! But enough complaing

So lately I've been trying to get Ginny and Sean together.. they seem to be working things out themselves so I'll leave it at that! and OMG... Rusty justed IMed me.. this is funny...

RuStY04828:hey who si this
Caro2TheRescue: hey.. it's Caroline
RuStY04828: huh
RuStY04828: oh hey
RuStY04828: how did u get on my buddy list
Caro2TheRescue: umm prolly Sanchez.. he's been on your sn b4
RuStY04828: he is the one who is always on my sn 
Caro2TheRescue: yeah
RuStY04828: that bastard
Caro2TheRescue: lol

Anywayz.. here is a message to...
SEAN: agahdglkasd jgalsdkgj asljg alsdjg al
TRISTAN: I'm back on my journal! w00t w00t I did it just for you!
RYAN: I LOVE YOU SOO MUCH! =D

later tards!

<3 Caro <3

TONIGHT WAS FUN!

Lets see.. it was around 8 and Ryan is sitting on the couch cuz I'm running around still trying to get ready. Rachel D calls and was like I need a ride.. cuz I can go! So I asked Ryan if we could pick her up.. he's like yeaah. So we pick her up.. then Ginny... I have to fucking lay on the cuz we all didn't fit in his truck *hehe*

So at Frankies.. We go crazy at the Put Put course thingy..then wait in line a loong fucking time to ride the go-carts ((so much fun of course)) and right away.. I spin out Rachel *lmao* that was soo much fun.. but yeah. So after the race I turn to the side and guess who I see.. TRISTAN!! *lol* It was nice seeing him again. We never really got to talk all that much but yeah

Me and Rachel are walking over to the Bumper Boats and BAM Sean and Chris show up! SO AWESOME!! So  yeah.. Chris and Rachel hug and all that shit.. and then me and Rachel go together on one of the Bumper Boats.. I steered.. she sprayed.. I GOT US SOAKING WET! f'in yeah doggie

So after wards I have the keys to Ryan's truck.. so I decide to go run out ther.. but I'm not wearing shoes and I can't run cuz my jeans are soaking wet.. extremely long and heavy.. so I only make it out to the middle of the parking lot.. we go back in use up our coins.. and head home OH yeah.. I drove Ryan's truck around the parking lot.. okay I guesss... So on the way to Ginny's Chris calls Rachel.. poor Rachel.. Chris is kind of confusing.. I'm not gonna go into that tho.. so yeah!

So I get home.. I'm already missing my Ryan =( I love my Ryan! Hopefully we will be hangin out tomorrow at Keri's little swim team party thingy.. SO YEAH! HORAY! Time Trials are tomorrow.. and I'm hungry!! But there is nothing to eat in this damned house! So peace out tards!

<3 Caro <3

Well I'm like EXTREMELY bored and I'm gonna make a few cds *heh* and well I'm gonna post the songs I want to burn.. if ya can think of anymore comment and tell me! THANKS

Today was sooo much fun! I woke up this morning and Keri, me, Ryan, and Mark all went to Frankies. Ryan came and picked me up and we got to Frankies a lil early lol so we went inside and I got some tokens.. then this guy that was working there gives Ryan a hand full of tokens.. then he gave me some! So we got a bunch of free tokens lol So we spent all our tokens... and he ((of course)) kicked my ass at a racing game.. but oh well! Then Keri and Mark finally got there at like 12:45!! I knew they would take forever.. oh well. But yeah Keri spent some money and she got a bunch of tickets. I only got like 5:30.. so I let Ryan pick out a stuffed animal for me *it was a lepord or something of that sort lol* Then I got 6 googly eyed rings =D

After that we went to the mall ((all 4 of us)) and it was pouring outside when we got there.. Mark dropped Keri off so she didn't get wet.. I didn't give a damn so me and Ryan had to RUN from the back of the parking lot to the food court.. OMG we got soo wet!! lol Then we went to Hot Topic.. I got like a million pins and a sticker.. we went to the Dollar store and Spencers... then to the Food Court.. and after we ate.. Keri and Mark had to leave cuz Keri had to work

So me and Ryan end up coming back to my house.. we watch the Bourne Idenity and then Vh1 *hehe* I'm guessing he stayed at my house for like 4 hours cuz he didn't leave until like 8:15 BUT IT"S ALL GOOD!

I had soo much fun today and I"m soo happy I got to spend the whole day with Ryan =)It was awsome!! but yeah I need to go to hw >=O what a bitch.. so later tards!!

<3 Caro <3

Hello! How are you? I hope you're doing GREAT cuz it's 10 til 10 and I"m extremely bored!!

Last few days in school haven't been that exciting. I only get to see my Ryan during lunch and after school =( quite depressing. Oh well... hopefully we will find a way to see each other more often =D The one thing that does suck about school is HW *gah* I mean for real don't they give us enough work DURING school? Why must we go home and do MORE work! okay that's the end of my story there. I've had to much hw for just being in Honors! I don't want a lot of hw I have swim practice from 5-7 every night which interferes w/ HW BIG TIME! oh well.

New chick on the team.. WOW IS SHE GOOD she's better than Reaghan. Nice to finally see someone ON THE TEAM be better than Reaghn. Tho I'm already jealous. I wish I was that good =( Quite depressing.. OH WELL! I guess I'll just have to work my asss off harder and harder. I tried doing that tonight but well IT WAS SO MUCH AND KIND OF HARD! I was dead after practice. I complained a lot to Jaeson and I'm sure he was getting annoyed at me but oh well.. NOTHING I CAN DO! I tried my hardest. But I still yet have to decide who to vote Captain.. my mom says I should go for it. I don't really want to. I don't know why cuz I could help a few ppl and I have a little team spirit lol.. Not a lot tho!

Okay to change subects... I was doing espanol hw tonight and well I didn't know the answers the questions cuz they were like AHH all about hispanic countries.. so I kept asking my mom stuff and she wasn't sure about one answer so I told her I'll just go w/ her instinct. Then my dad goes why don't you look it up and I was like well I can't.. no where to look it up! I never learned the stuff last year.. but there goes my dad "You're an idiot" and of course my mom yells at him tellin ghim I wasn't an idiot but it pissed me off! I hate when he does that.. he knows nothing of it.. HE NEVER HAD SPANISH! ugg it pissed me off I told him to shut up I've never told him that before but he pissed me off.. I could have said a few other things but I keep it PG rated around my parents.. I no cuss!

Well looks like I need to fill a sheet out for swim team, walk my dog and well since I'm so fucking bored I guess I'll go to bed =(

<3 Caro <3

I MADE IT OUT ALIVE! lol The first day of school was pretty good. Even tho I'm getting a headache now and I have hw >:O oh well.. I like the people who are in most of my classes ((yes most)) and well I hate it when ppl ask "Do you have an older sister that went here a few years agao" YES NOW LEAVE ME THE FUCK ALONE!!! lol But yeah.. school is still the same tho.. boring and well boring

It also seems to be that lately I can't ever sit still for long periods of time. It really SUCKS! But yeah.. it started in Algerbra 2. I HAD TO GET UP but the bell wasn't gonna ring for another fricken 30 min!! GRR oh well. I guess I'll have to find a way to have fun so I can sit still lol

AWWW.. Ryan is the best ever!! look at the quote he made... "The way i feel when im with you, tears my heart out when i miss you. a minute, a hour , a day goes by the love we sharin will never die" aww I think that's soo sweet!! 

Well anywayz.. peaz out tards!

<3 Caro <3

Post anything that you want, and post it anonymously. Anything. A story, a poem, a song, a secret, a confession, a fear, a love -- anything. Be sure to post anonymously and honestly. Post twice if you'd like. Then, put this in your LJ to see what your friends (and perhaps others who you don't even realize read your LJ) have to say.

Well I've decided to get this journal back again. I miss typing everything I do in a day.. even when it isn't that much! sike! lol Well not too much has changed since I last updated. I'm now dating Ryan Lear ((coolest and most awesomest guy ever!)) and School starts monday. DAMN!

Swim Team for the highschool started last monday and of course.. the torturing begins! I swear.. Jonathon is out to ruin my life! lol He tried to drown me friday but it's all good. Coach is of course still calling me "Closet Goth" but it's down to "CG" wtf Oh well. The team is awsm. I LOVE IT! lol

I get to go shopping tomorrow to Khols w/ my momma.. wonder if Mark will be working.. it'd be fun if he is hehehehehe! yeah.. guess I should also make sure I have everything for school *sighs* depressing.. Summer is pretty much over =(

Okay so I've updated... it's 11:46 damn... not tired tho.. want to go out and do somethng crazy... *gets gun* WOOO! j/k later tards!

<3 Caro <3

Last night was a BLAST! I spent the night over at Ginny's after a boring 4 hours at The Fort. We were suppose to work the swim team stand but no one signed up and it was as slow as can be! So Ginny called coach and he said we could leave. So we go back.. get some dinner and watch Ace Ventura!! HORAY! that movie is great! So yeah then we go to the computer to see who was online. Ginny was talkign to Ryan to try to figure out who he likes ((he still won't tell us.. CURSE YOU RYAN!!)) haha! So Ginny decides we should call Ryan and try to figure it out... so she takes my phone and she pretty much spends the rest of the night talking to Ryan and Sanchez occasionaly. I spent the most of my night talking to Ryan Lear ((he's a pretty cool guy! =) )) But yeah. We had some crazy fun like...

Brow lifts using rubber bands!
I"M A HORSEY! hahahaha
PIGGY NOSE!
Having a big "orgy" party lol

Prolly a lot more but I can't memmber!!! All I know was it was a frickin BLAST! HORAY!

So today I leave to go to Valdosta, Georgia to visit my middle sister, Colleen.. I still can't get over the fact that she is 21.. but then again Stephanie is 26.. only 4 years from being 30 EEEEK! I have old sisters!! hahaha j/k. But yeah.. I won't be back until Sunday night prollly so if you need me you'll just have to call my cell... I might answer.. ONLY IF I LOVE YOU! But that's everyone.. sike.. there are quite a few exceptions to that!! But you should know if I love you or not!!!

<3 Caro <3

Well nothing special has happened in the past few days.. that's maily why I haven't updated. But yeah prolly something did happen and I was just to lazy to remember to tell you nosy little people who like to read my journal just to see how my life is!! heh.. j/k. But yeah!

I went to registration today ((woo)) I got my schedule looked at it and got pissed.. they gave me 2 study halls in 2nd semester! so we waited for like 45 min. just to get into the room to change schedules and then we try to find a class.. I originally wanted weight lifting and business law.. BUT NO!!! So I end up getting Marine Biology ((okay)) and we couldn't find a class for my other study hall that wouldn't mess up every other class.. so I decided to take the study hall ((not that bad cuz my schedule is pretty packed!)) but yeah here it is!

S1
1st- Spanish 2, Williams, K
2nd- Chemistry 1, McClam
3rd- Algerbra 2, Streetman
4th- Sociology, Stukes
S2
1st- Spanish 3, Johnson, G.
2nd- Marine Biology, Westbrook, D
3rd- English 3, Watson
4th- Study Hall (blah!)

okay.. enjoy!! ps.. locker # 296

<3 Caro <3

Hahaha.. sry cuss word spazm.. what's that calle again?? hmmoh well don't matter to me I know I cuss to much but I don't care.. if you got a problem w/ it well then.. FUCK YOU! hehe

Yesterday was alright. I went to the beach w/ Keri and Mark and then they ended up coming over to watch Starsky and Hutch ((DUMB ASS MOVIE!!)) But yeah. Today wasn't that much fun.. I cleaned, slept, went to the pool, read, slept, and cleaned some more. Our computer crashed so I had to wait unitl like 11 tonight to be able to get on.. OH WELL! nothing else to say...

<3 Caro <3

Yesterday wasn't much fun. I woke up around 12 and just lazed around all day..I was extremely lazy yesterday. But then my mom was like get in the shower so you can drive to the store w/ me. I'm like you just want an excuse to get me in the shower! So I end up getting in the shower around 4 and we leave for the store around 5. I asked if we could have tacos for dinner so I get the taco stuff ((yummmmmmmmy!!)) But yeah. Then after dinner Bryan IMs me and was like wanna come over and play poker ((it's like 8:30)) I'm like yeah.. I"m bored as fuck I've been bored all day.. So Mark, Kate, and Bryan drive all the way from S'ville just to come get me =) I feel so loved!! But yeah.. we ended up playin Taboo ((FUN GAME!)) ARound 9 Kate had to leave so we go out and Mark has to move his car. I'm like hey mark let me drive. HIm being dumb gives me the keys!! hahahaha So I back out of the driveway and I was gonna drive around the circle in the wrong direction. But Mark freaks out and jumped into the car. So we drove around the neighborhood and come back to Bryan's. HAHAH it was funn!! Tho Mark says it wasn't!! hehehehehe So at 10 Mark has to leave and me and Bryan are just sitting at the comp. watching some stuff from starterupsteve.com haha the best sites ever!! so yeah. Bryan takes me home around 10:30 since I had to be home at 11. ANd yeah that was pretty much my day.. it was only fun for those few hours at Bryan's! =D

So today I'm gonna be the 3rd wheel once again w/ Mark and Keri and go to the beach. But hey that's cool. Hopefully the cute surfers will be there so I can "gawk" lol but yeah. I'll update later. Mother is yelling me BLAH BLAH BLAH that's all I ever hear lol

<3 Caro <3

Today was interesting...

I had my first driving lesson today. It went really good. I did really good on parallel parking and 3point turn and all that stuff.. I just had trouble pulling into grass and then backing back up the same way I came in.. THAT WAS HARD! haha

After my lesson Keri and Mark call up and was like we're gonna go visit Richard at IronGate. so I'm okay w/e. So we go to IronGate pool and Mark and Keri end up leaving and going to Target. I hang out w/ Richard and the next person that was suppose to come after him never came. So I ended up going home w/ him cuz Keri and Mark went to O'Charlies so Keri could get her paycheck. So we hang out at his house and Keri and Mark come pick us up. SO BACK TO MY HOUSE IT WAS!

We didn't rent any movies so we watched Bring It On Again ((gay Mark wanted to see it! lol)) And after that movie was over we watched Pirates Of The Carribean. Somewhere during the movies my mom orders us pizza so we chow down ((yummmm!)) and let me just say during the night.. Mark saw some "melons" that he didn't want to see **lol Mark!.. you're awsm tho! sry for crushing you!! ;)**

But yeah.. that was pretty much my day and I just want to say.. Mark and Keri.. thanks for watching over me and trust me I will be careful. I have the greatest friends in the world and I love you guys to death!!! Thanks for always being there for me and if anyone ever needs a thing I'm here for you too! =)

<3 lots! Caro <3
